Dear Dr. Goodwin,
should be possible to share the reaction mechanism with the user's group?

Thank you

Michele


David Goodwin ha scritto:
> Yes, we do this using the recent mechanism developed by Prof. Olaf  
> Deutschmann's group at U. Karlsruhe.  I can send you their reaction  
> mechanism converted into Cantera format.
> 
> 
> On Jan 25, 2007, at 12:03 AM, Claudia wrote:
> 
>> Hi Cantera Users,
>>
>> has anybody tried to model steam methane reforming over a Nickel
>> catalyst including surface reactions? Any code available?
>> Any help will be appreciated.
>>
>> Claud
